.. module:: phenoscope

PhenoScope
==========================================

.. container:: subtitle

   A modular framework for bioimage analysis and visualization


Welcome to PhenoScope's documentation. Here you'll find comprehensive guides and examples to help you get the most out of PhenoScope.
